articles.title: NC State QB Grayson McCall says he's retiring after head injuries - ESPN
articles.description: QB Grayson McCall, who transferred to NC State from Coastal Carolina, where he threw for more than 10,000 yards, is retiring from football after another concussion.
articles.content:
NC State quarterback Grayson McCall is retiring from football following his latest head injury that he suffered earlier this month, he announced Wednesday.
